name: Team IDK - Two at a Time
name_original: Team IDK - Two at a Time
description:
Two at a Time was created during the 2021 Collab-Jam hosted by Sharkmob and Ukie. We wanted to explore a game where two characters are controlled through the same input. Horizontal distance between characters in the 2 planes are also utilized as a mechanic. We wanted to develop our level design abilities when taking into account a unique mechanic. 

Scenario

After an time machine experiment went wrong, a little girl genius and her dog are stuck in different times of history! Help them both to get home. 

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump

Credits

  • Code -  Neve O'Neill
  • Animation/Level Design - Ferrel Kennedy
  • Art - Amy Lowe
  • Sound - Patrik Andersson
  • Mentor - Danial Rashidi
